sentences.en: ...the hill where St. George slew the dragon.
And a voice came to him: Rise up, Peter; slay and eat!
sentences.cn: 13又有声音向他说, 彼得,起来, 宰了吃!

sentences.en: He intended to slay his father's murderer.
I could easily slay you and heal myself to full capacity.
sentences.cn: 我可以轻松地杀了你,然后使自己痊愈.

sentences.en: I offer you the very blade I used to slay a titan.
sentences.cn: 我赐予你我那我那真正的武器,那我曾经用来杀死过泰坦巨人的武器.

sentences.en: If the Builder slays thine offspring dost thou slay thyself?
sentences.cn: 如果建筑者屠杀你的子孙,你会杀死你自己 吗 ?

sentences.en: Neither gunfire nor two days in a refrigerator could slay this duck.
sentences.cn: 枪击与在冰箱待两天都不能取这只鸭子性命.

sentences.en: Shall they therefore empty theirand not spare continually to slay the nations?
sentences.cn: 17他岂可屡次倒空网罗,将列国的人时常杀戮,毫不顾惜 呢 ?

sentences.en: She has ordered me to slay you.
That is because it is a monstrous thing , to slay a unicorn.
sentences.cn: 杀死一只独角兽算得上是滔天罪行.

sentences.en: The wicked watcheth the righteous, and seeketh to slay him.
sentences.cn: 32恶人窥探义人, 想要杀他.

sentences.en: They slay the widow and the stranger And murder the orphans.
sentences.cn: 诗94:6他们杀死寡妇和寄居的、又杀害孤儿.

sentences.en: They slay the widow and the stranger, and murder the fatherless.
sentences.cn: 他们杀死寡妇和寄居的, 又杀害孤儿.

sentences.en: They will seize, they will slay me.
sentences.cn: 他们会把我抓走, 他们会杀死我的.

sentences.en: Will they therefore empty their net And continually slay nations without sparing?
sentences.cn: 哈1:17他岂可屡次倒空网罗、列国的人时常杀戮、不顾惜 呢 .

sentences.en: Would slay whoever dared confront Those moustaches that Bristled like porcupinequills.
sentences.cn: 杀人莫敢前,须如猬毛磔.

trans.tran_cn: <书>杀, 杀死, 宰杀, 杀害, 宰杀, 杀死
trans.tran_en: to kill someone – used especially in newspapers
